mapper.select: SELECT s.`station_name`,ta.`task_area_name`,fbm.`factory_name` FROM station s LEFT JOIN task_area ta ON s.`task_area_id` = ta.`task_area_id` LEFT JOIN factory_basic_msg fbm ON ta.`factory_id` = fbm.`factory_id` WHERE s.station_id = #{stationId}
SELECT ft.`factory_type_name` FROM station s LEFT JOIN factory_type ft ON s.`factory_type_id` = ft.`factory_type_id` WHERE s.`station_id` = #{stationId}
